examples: He was lying on his back on the sofa.
Estaba acostado de espaldas en el sofá.
Do you sleep on your back or your front?
She was standing with her back to the camera so you can't see her face.
Ella estaba de espaldas a la cámara para que no se le pudiera ver la cara.
They had their hands tied behind their backs.
Tenían las manos atadas a la espalda.
